question_text: Figure 12 shows two cans, a radiant heater and some other apparatus. The cans absorb thermal radiation from the heater. One can has a matt black surface and the other can has a shiny silver surface. Both cans contain water at the same temperature. Describe how a student could use the apparatus in Figure 12 to determine which can is the better absorber of thermal radiation.
subject: Physics
